biocontainers.name: phantompeakqualtools
biocontainers.summary: This package computes informative enrichment and quality measures for chip-seq/dnase-seq/faire-seq/mnase-seq data. it can also be used to obtain robust estimates of the predominant fragment length or characteristic tag shift values in these assays.

biotools.summary: This package computes quick but highly informative enrichment and quality measures for ChIP-seq/DNase-seq/FAIRE-seq/MNase-seq data. It can also be used to obtain robust estimates of the predominant fragment length or characteristic tag shift values in these assays.

bioschemas.name: phantompeakqualtools
bioschemas.summary: This package computes quick but highly informative enrichment and quality measures for ChIP-seq/DNase-seq/FAIRE-seq/MNase-seq data. It can also be used to obtain robust estimates of the predominant fragment length or characteristic tag shift values in these assays.
